00015 template<typename ST, typename DT> bool try_cast( const ST &source, DT &dest )
00016 {
00017     bool ret = true;
00018 
00019     try {
00020         dest = boost::lexical_cast<DT>( source );
00021     } catch ( boost::bad_lexical_cast e ) {
00022         ret = false;
00023     }
00024 
00025     return ret;
00026 }

00028 template<typename T> std::list<T> dcmtkListString2list( DcmElement *elem )
00029 {
00030     OFString buff;
00031     elem->getOFStringArray( buff );
00032     return util::stringToList<T>( std::string( buff.c_str() ), '\\' );

00042 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseAS( DcmElement *elem, const util::istring &name, util::PropertyMap &map )
00043 {
00044     uint16_t duration = 0;
00045     OFString buff;
00046     elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00047     static boost::numeric::converter <
00048     uint16_t, double,
00049             boost::numeric::conversion_traits<uint16_t, double>,
00050             boost::numeric::def_overflow_handler,
00051             boost::numeric::RoundEven<double>
00052             > double2uint16;
00053 
00054     if ( _internal::try_cast( buff.substr( 0, 3 ), duration ) ) {
00055         switch ( buff.at( buff.size() - 1 ) ) {
00056         case 'D':
00057         case 'd':
00058             break;
00059         case 'W':
00060         case 'w':
00061             duration *= 7;
00062             break;
00063         case 'M':
00064         case 'm':
00065             duration = double2uint16( 30.436875 * duration ); // year/12
00066             break;
00067         case 'Y':
00068         case 'y':
00069             duration = double2uint16( 365.2425 * duration ); //mean length of a year
00070             break;
00071         default:
00072             LOG( Runtime, warning )
00073                     << "Missing age-type-letter, assuming days";
00074         }
00075 
00076         map.propertyValue( name ) = duration;
00077         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00078                 << "Parsed age for " << name << "(" <<  buff << ")"
00079                 << " as " << duration << " days";
00080     } else
00081         LOG( Runtime, warning )
00082                 << "Cannot parse age string \"" << buff << "\" in the field \"" << name << "\"";
00083 }

00094 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseDA( DcmElement *elem, const util::istring &name, util::PropertyMap &map )
00095 {
00096     //@todo if we drop support for old yyyy.mm.dd this would be much easier
00097     boost::regex reg( "^([[:digit:]]{4})\\.?([[:digit:]]{2})\\.?([[:digit:]]{2})$" );
00098     boost::cmatch results;
00099     OFString buff;
00100     elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00101 
00102     if ( boost::regex_match( buff.c_str(), results, reg ) ) {
00103         const boost::gregorian::date date(
00104             boost::lexical_cast<int16_t>( results.str( 1 ) ), //year
00105             boost::lexical_cast<int16_t>( results.str( 2 ) ), //month
00106             boost::lexical_cast<int16_t>( results.str( 3 ) ) //day of month
00107         );
00108         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00109                 << "Parsed date for " << name << "(" <<  buff << ")" << " as " << date;
00110         map.propertyValue( name ) = date;
00111     } else
00112         LOG( Runtime, warning )
00113                 << "Cannot parse Date string \"" << buff << "\" in the field \"" << name << "\"";
00114 }

00135 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseTM( DcmElement *elem, const util::istring &name, util::PropertyMap &map )
00136 {
00137     short shift = 0;
00138     OFString buff;
00139     bool ok = true;
00140     boost::posix_time::time_duration time;
00141     elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00142 
00143     // Insert the ":" -- make it hh:mm:ss.frac
00144     if ( buff.at( 2 ) != ':' ) {
00145         buff.insert( 2, 1, ':' );
00146         shift++;
00147     }
00148 
00149     if ( ( buff.size() > size_t( 4 + shift ) ) && ( buff.at( 4 + shift ) != ':' ) ) {
00150         buff.insert( 4 + shift, 1, ':' );
00151         shift++;
00152     }
00153 
00154     //Try standard-parser for hh:mm:ss.frac
00155     try {
00156         time = boost::posix_time::duration_from_string( buff.c_str() );
00157         ok = not time.is_not_a_date_time();
00158     } catch ( std::logic_error e ) {
00159         ok = false;
00160     }
00161 
00162     if ( ok ) {
00163         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00164                 << "Parsed time for " << name << "(" <<  buff << ")" << " as " << time;
00165         map.propertyValue( name ) = boost::posix_time::ptime( boost::gregorian::date( 1400, 1, 1 ), time );
00166         //although TM is defined as time of day we dont have a day here, so we fake one
00167     } else
00168         LOG( Runtime, warning )
00169                 << "Cannot parse Time string \"" << buff << "\" in the field \"" << name << "\"";
00170 }

00172 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseScalar( DcmElement *elem, const util::istring &name, util::PropertyMap &map )
00173 {
00174     OFString buff;
00175 
00176     switch ( elem->getVR() ) {
00177     case EVR_AS: { // age string (nnnD, nnnW, nnnM, nnnY)
00178         parseAS( elem, name, map );
00179     }
00180     break;
00181     case EVR_DA: {
00182         parseDA( elem, name, map );
00183     }
00184     break;
00185     case EVR_TM: {
00186         parseTM( elem, name, map );
00187     }
00188     break;
00189     case EVR_FL: {
00190         Float32 buff;
00191         elem->getFloat32( buff );
00192         map.setPropertyAs<float>( name, buff ); //if Float32 is float its fine, if not we will get an compiler error here
00193     }
00194     break;
00195     case EVR_FD: {
00196         Float64 buff;
00197         elem->getFloat64( buff );
00198         map.setPropertyAs<double>( name, buff ); //if Float64 is double its fine, if not we will get an compiler error here
00199     }
00200     break;
00201     case EVR_DS: { //Decimal String (can be floating point)
00202         elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00203         map.setPropertyAs<double>( name, boost::lexical_cast<double>( buff ) );
00204     }
00205     break;
00206     case EVR_SL: { //signed long
00207         Sint32 buff;
00208         elem->getSint32( buff );
00209         map.setPropertyAs<int32_t>( name, buff ); //seems like Sint32 is not allways int32_t, so enforce it
00210     }
00211     break;
00212     case EVR_SS: { //signed short
00213         Sint16 buff;
00214         elem->getSint16( buff );
00215         map.setPropertyAs<int16_t>( name, buff );
00216     }
00217     break;
00218     case EVR_UL: { //unsigned long
00219         Uint32 buff;
00220         elem->getUint32( buff );
00221         map.setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( name, buff );
00222     }
00223     break;
00224     case EVR_US: { //unsigned short
00225         Uint16 buff;
00226         elem->getUint16( buff );
00227         map.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( name, buff );
00228     }
00229     break;
00230     case EVR_IS: { //integer string
00231         elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00232         map.setPropertyAs<int32_t>( name, boost::lexical_cast<int32_t>( buff ) );
00233     }
00234     break;
00235     case EVR_AE: //Application Entity (string)
00236     case EVR_CS: // Code String (string)
00237     case EVR_LT: //long text
00238     case EVR_SH: //short string
00239     case EVR_LO: //long string
00240     case EVR_ST: //short text
00241     case EVR_UT: //Unlimited Text
00242     case EVR_UI: //Unique Identifier [0-9\.]
00243     case EVR_PN: { //Person Name
00244         elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00245         map.setPropertyAs<std::string>( name, boost::lexical_cast<std::string>( buff ) );
00246     }
00247     break;
00248     default: {
00249         elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00250         LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Implement me "
00251                              << name << "("
00252                              << const_cast<DcmTag &>( elem->getTag() ).getVRName() << "):"
00253                              << buff;
00254     }
00255     break;
00256     }
00257 }

00259 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseVector( DcmElement *elem, const util::istring &name, isis::util::PropertyMap &map )
00260 {
00261     OFString buff;
00262     size_t len = elem->getVM();
00263 
00264     switch ( elem->getVR() ) {
00265     case EVR_FL: {
00266         Float32 *buff;
00267         elem->getFloat32Array( buff );
00268         util::fvector4 vector;
00269         vector.copyFrom( buff, buff + len );
00270         map.propertyValue( name ) = vector; //if Float32 is float its fine, if not we will get an linker error here
00271     }
00272     break;
00273     case EVR_FD: {
00274         Float64 *buff;
00275         elem->getFloat64Array( buff );
00276         util::dvector4 vector;
00277         vector.copyFrom( buff, buff + len );
00278         map.propertyValue( name ) = vector; //if Float64 is double its fine, if not we will get an linker error here
00279     }
00280     break;
00281     case EVR_IS: {
00282         const util::ilist tokens = _internal::dcmtkListString2list<int>( elem );
00283         util::ivector4 vector;
00284         vector.copyFrom( tokens.begin(), tokens.end() );
00285         map.propertyValue( name ) = vector;
00286     }
00287     break;
00288     case EVR_SL: {
00289         Sint32 *buff;
00290         elem->getSint32Array( buff );
00291         util::ivector4 vector;
00292         vector.copyFrom( buff, buff + len );
00293         map.propertyValue( name ) = vector;
00294     }
00295     break;
00296     case EVR_US: {
00297         Uint16 *buff;
00298         elem->getUint16Array( buff );
00299         util::ivector4 vector;
00300         vector.copyFrom( buff, buff + len );
00301         map.propertyValue( name ) = vector;
00302     }
00303     break;
00304     case EVR_CS: // Code String (string)
00305     case EVR_SH: //short string
00306     case EVR_ST: { //short text
00307         map.propertyValue( name ) = _internal::dcmtkListString2list<std::string>( elem );
00308     }
00309     break;
00310     case EVR_DS: {
00311         const util::dlist tokens = _internal::dcmtkListString2list<double>( elem );
00312         util::dvector4 vector;
00313         vector.copyFrom( tokens.begin(), tokens.end() );
00314         map.propertyValue( name ) = vector;
00315     }
00316     break;
00317     case EVR_AS:
00318     case EVR_DA:
00319     case EVR_TM:
00320     case EVR_SS:
00321     case EVR_UL:
00322     case EVR_AE: //Application Entity (string)
00323     case EVR_LT: //long text
00324     case EVR_LO: //long string
00325     case EVR_UT: //Unlimited Text
00326     case EVR_UI: //Unique Identifier [0-9\.]
00327     case EVR_PN:
00328     default: {
00329         elem->getOFStringArray( buff );
00330         LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Implement me "
00331                              << name << "("
00332                              << const_cast<DcmTag &>( elem->getTag() ).getVRName() << "):"
00333                              << buff;
00334     }
00335     break;
00336     }
00337 
00338     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Parsed the vector " << name << " as " << map.propertyValue( name );
00339 }

00341 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseList( DcmElement *elem, const util::istring &name, isis::util::PropertyMap &map )
00342 {
00343     OFString buff;
00344     size_t len = elem->getVM();
00345 
00346     switch ( elem->getVR() ) {
00347     case EVR_FL: {
00348         Float32 *buff;
00349         elem->getFloat32Array( buff );
00350         map.propertyValue( name ) = util::dlist( buff, buff + len );
00351     }
00352     break;
00353     case EVR_FD: {
00354         Float64 *buff;
00355         elem->getFloat64Array( buff );
00356         map.propertyValue( name ) = util::dlist( buff, buff + len );
00357     }
00358     break;
00359     case EVR_IS: {
00360         map.propertyValue( name ) = _internal::dcmtkListString2list<int>( elem );
00361     }
00362     break;
00363     case EVR_SL: {
00364         Sint32 *buff;
00365         elem->getSint32Array( buff );
00366         map.propertyValue( name ) = util::ilist( buff, buff + len );
00367     }
00368     break;
00369     case EVR_US: {
00370         Uint16 *buff;
00371         elem->getUint16Array( buff );
00372         map.propertyValue( name ) = util::ilist( buff, buff + len );
00373     }
00374     break;
00375     case EVR_CS: // Code String (string)
00376     case EVR_SH: //short string
00377     case EVR_ST: { //short text
00378         map.propertyValue( name ) = _internal::dcmtkListString2list<std::string>( elem );
00379     }
00380     break;
00381     case EVR_DS: {
00382         map.propertyValue( name ) = _internal::dcmtkListString2list<double>( elem );
00383     }
00384     break;
00385     case EVR_AS:
00386     case EVR_DA:
00387     case EVR_TM:
00388     case EVR_SS:
00389     case EVR_UL:
00390     case EVR_AE: //Application Entity (string)
00391     case EVR_LT: //long text
00392     case EVR_LO: //long string
00393     case EVR_UT: //Unlimited Text
00394     case EVR_UI: //Unique Identifier [0-9\.]
00395     case EVR_PN:
00396     default: {
00397         elem->getOFStringArray( buff );
00398         LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Implement me "
00399                              << name << "("
00400                              << const_cast<DcmTag &>( elem->getTag() ).getVRName() << "):"
00401                              << buff;
00402     }
00403     break;
00404     }
00405 
00406     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Parsed the list " << name << " as " << map.propertyValue( name );
00407 }

00409 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseCSA( DcmElement *elem, isis::util::PropertyMap &map, const std::string &dialect )
00410 {
00411     Uint8 *array;
00412     elem->getUint8Array( array );
00413     const size_t len = elem->getLength();
00414 
00415     for ( std::string::size_type pos = 0x10; pos < ( len - sizeof( Sint32 ) ); ) {
00416         pos += parseCSAEntry( array + pos, map, dialect );
00417     }
00418 }
00419 size_t ImageFormat_Dicom::parseCSAEntry( Uint8 *at, isis::util::PropertyMap &map, const std::string &dialect )
00420 {
00421     size_t pos = 0;
00422     const char *const name = ( char * )at + pos;
00423     pos += 0x40;
00424     assert( name[0] );
00425     /*Sint32 &vm=*((Sint32*)array+pos);*/
00426     pos += sizeof( Sint32 );
00427     const char *const vr = ( char * )at + pos;
00428     pos += 0x4;
00429     /*Sint32 syngodt=endian<Uint8,Uint32>(array+pos);*/
00430     pos += sizeof( Sint32 );
00431     const Sint32 nitems = endian<Uint8, Uint32>( at + pos );
00432     pos += sizeof( Sint32 );
00433 
00434     if ( nitems ) {
00435         pos += sizeof( Sint32 ); //77
00436         util::slist ret;
00437 
00438         for ( unsigned short n = 0; n < nitems; n++ ) {
00439             Sint32 len = endian<Uint8, Uint32>( at + pos );
00440             pos += sizeof( Sint32 );//the length of this element
00441             pos += 3 * sizeof( Sint32 ); //whatever
00442 
00443             if ( !len )continue;
00444 
00445             if( (
00446                     std::string( "MrPhoenixProtocol" ) != name  && std::string( "MrEvaProtocol" ) != name && std::string( "MrProtocol" ) != name
00447                 ) || dialect == "withExtProtocols" ) {
00448                 std::string insert( ( char * )at + pos );
00449                 const std::string whitespaces( " \t\f\v\n\r" );
00450                 const std::string::size_type start = insert.find_first_not_of( whitespaces );
00451 
00452                 if ( insert.empty() || start == std::string::npos ) {
00453                     LOG( Runtime, verbose_info ) << "Skipping empty string for CSA entry " << name;
00454                 } else {
00455                     const std::string::size_type end = insert.find_last_not_of( whitespaces ); //strip spaces
00456 
00457                     if( end == std::string::npos )
00458                         ret.push_back( insert.substr( start, insert.size() - start ) ); //store the text if there is some
00459                     else
00460                         ret.push_back( insert.substr( start, end + 1 - start ) );//store the text if there is some
00461                 }
00462             } else {
00463                 LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Skipping " << name << " as its not requested by the dialect (use dialect \"withExtProtocols\" to get it)";
00464             }
00465 
00466             pos += (
00467                        ( len + sizeof( Sint32 ) - 1 ) / sizeof( Sint32 )
00468                    ) *
00469                    sizeof( Sint32 );//increment pos by len aligned to sizeof(Sint32)*/
00470         }
00471 
00472         try {
00473             if ( ret.size() == 1 ) {
00474                 if ( parseCSAValue( ret.front(), name, vr, map ) ) {
00475                     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Found scalar entry " << name << ":" << map.propertyValue( name ) << " in CSA header";
00476                 }
00477             } else if ( ret.size() > 1 ) {
00478                 if ( parseCSAValueList( ret, name, vr, map ) ) {
00479                     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Found list entry " << name << ":" << map.propertyValue( name ) << " in CSA header";
00480                 }
00481             }
00482         } catch ( boost::bad_lexical_cast e ) {
00483             LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Failed to parse CSA entry " << std::make_pair( name, ret ) << " as " << vr << " (" << e.what() << ")";
00484         }
00485     } else {
00486         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Skipping empty CSA entry " << name;
00487         pos += sizeof( Sint32 );
00488     }
00489 
00490     return pos;
00491 }
00492 
00493 bool ImageFormat_Dicom::parseCSAValue( const std::string &val, const util::istring &name, const util::istring &vr, isis::util::PropertyMap &map )
00494 {
00495     if ( vr == "IS" or vr == "SL" ) {
00496         map.propertyValue( name ) = boost::lexical_cast<int32_t>( val );
00497     } else if ( vr == "UL" ) {
00498         map.propertyValue( name ) = boost::lexical_cast<uint32_t>( val );
00499     } else if ( vr == "CS" or vr == "LO" or vr == "SH" or vr == "UN" or vr == "ST" ) {
00500         map.propertyValue( name ) = val;
00501     } else if ( vr == "DS" or vr == "FD" ) {
00502         map.propertyValue( name ) = boost::lexical_cast<double>( val );
00503     } else if ( vr == "US" ) {
00504         map.propertyValue( name ) = boost::lexical_cast<uint16_t>( val );
00505     } else if ( vr == "SS" ) {
00506         map.propertyValue( name ) = boost::lexical_cast<int16_t>( val );
00507     } else {
00508         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Dont know how to parse CSA entry " << std::make_pair( name, val ) << " type is " << util::MSubject( vr );
00509         return false;
00510     }
00511 
00512     return true;
00513 }
00514 bool ImageFormat_Dicom::parseCSAValueList( const util::slist &val, const util::istring &name, const util::istring &vr, isis::util::PropertyMap &map )
00515 {
00516     if ( vr == "IS" or vr == "SL" or vr == "US" or vr == "SS" ) {
00517         map.propertyValue( name ) = util::listToList<int32_t>( val.begin(), val.end() );
00518     } else if ( vr == "UL" ) {
00519         map.propertyValue( name ) = val; // @todo we dont have an unsigned int list
00520     } else if ( vr == "LO" or vr == "SH" or vr == "UN" or vr == "ST" or vr == "SL" ) {
00521         map.propertyValue( name ) = val;
00522     } else if ( vr == "DS" or vr == "FD" ) {
00523         map.propertyValue( name ) = util::listToList<double>( val.begin(), val.end() );
00524     } else {
00525         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Dont know how to parse CSA entry " << std::make_pair( name, val ) << " type is " << util::MSubject( vr );
00526         return false;
00527     }
00528 
00529     return true;
00530 }
00531 
00532 void ImageFormat_Dicom::dcmObject2PropMap( DcmObject *master_obj, isis::util::PropertyMap &map, const std::string &dialect )
00533 {
00534     for ( DcmObject *obj = master_obj->nextInContainer( NULL ); obj; obj = master_obj->nextInContainer( obj ) ) {
00535         const DcmTag &tag = obj->getTag();
00536         util::istring name;
00537         const DcmDataDictionary &globalDataDict = dcmDataDict.rdlock();
00538         const DcmDictEntry *dictRef = globalDataDict.findEntry( tag, tag.getPrivateCreator() );
00539 
00540         if ( dictRef )
00541             name = dictRef->getTagName();
00542         else
00543             name = util::istring( unknownTagName ) + tag.toString().c_str();
00544 
00545         dcmDataDict.unlock();
00546 
00547         if ( name == "PixelData" )
00548             continue;//skip the image data
00549         else if ( name == "CSAImageHeaderInfo" || tag == DcmTagKey( 0x0029, 0x1010 ) ) {
00550             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Using " << tag.toString() << " as CSAImageHeaderInfo";
00551             DcmElement *elem = dynamic_cast<DcmElement *>( obj );
00552             parseCSA( elem, map.branch( "CSAImageHeaderInfo" ), dialect );
00553         } else if ( name == "CSASeriesHeaderInfo" || tag == DcmTagKey( 0x0029, 0x1020 ) ) {
00554             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Using " << tag.toString() << " as CSASeriesHeaderInfo";
00555             DcmElement *elem = dynamic_cast<DcmElement *>( obj );
00556             parseCSA( elem, map.branch( "CSASeriesHeaderInfo" ), dialect );
00557         } else if ( name == "MedComHistoryInformation" ) {
00558             //@todo special handling needed
00559             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Ignoring MedComHistoryInformation at " << tag.toString();
00560         } else if ( obj->isLeaf() ) {
00561             DcmElement *elem = dynamic_cast<DcmElement *>( obj );
00562             const size_t mult = obj->getVM();
00563 
00564             if ( mult == 0 )
00565                 LOG( Runtime, verbose_info ) << "Skipping empty Dicom-Tag " << name;
00566             else if ( mult == 1 )
00567                 parseScalar( elem, name, map );
00568             else if ( mult <= 4 )
00569                 parseVector( elem, name, map );
00570             else
00571                 parseList( elem, name, map ); // for any other value
00572         } else {
00573             dcmObject2PropMap( obj, map.branch( name ), dialect );
00574         }
00575     }
00576 }
00577 
00578 }
00579 }
